page.title: 09 POPULATION AND HOUSING (2)
page.content: access to the Mid-Kent Shopping Centre. In other parts of Allington are older houses, built in the 1930's with an older generation of people living there. Isolated farms and oast houses are found near the disused Kentish Ragstone quarries. The British Legion Village is found to the N.W and here 138 houses are found in 1 square Km.Ringlestone and Sandling are much less densely populated settlements. House prices vary throughout the area. In Allington the average price for a 3-bedroom semi-detached house is Â£44,000. A detached 4-bedroom house in Queen's Road (a very attractive area) is Â£70,000. by Sara Pinnegar.
